 Graduate admissions 
 GRADUATE STUDIES AT CONCORDIA You're looking to dig deeper, hone your craft, sharpen your expertise.  Take an important first step: Find your program Explore all your study options 
 Complete your application 
 1.  CHOOSE A PROGRAM 
 2.  REVIEW THE REQUIREMENTS 
 3.  FIND A SUPERVISOR* 
 4.  APPLY 
 5.  AFTER YOU'VE APPLIED 
 *For thesis-based programs (check your department’s requirements) 
 Interdisciplinary programs Broaden your skills and experience beyond the boundaries of a single concentration. Learn more 
 Research supervision Work with one of our 1,900+ faculty members on innovative and cutting-edge research. Learn more 
 Research spaces Explore our research spaces for in-depth learning and knowledge creation. Learn more 
 Graduate funding Learn about the variety of funding available to you through scholarships, grants and other opportunities. Learn more 
 Life in Montreal Discover Montreal, the perfect place to learn, study and experience living in a multicultural environment. Learn more 
 GradProSkills Find success outside the classroom with professional development resources tailored for graduate students. Learn more
